itemInfo.itemDesc: A dried meat snack useful for long journeys.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying Butchered Meat.\n- It increases HP slightly when used.

item.name: Lamb Meat
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used in Cooking.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Butchering a sheep corpse.

- Usage: Steak, Meat Stew, Meat Pasta, etc.

item.name: Lizard Meat
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used in Cooking.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Butchering a lizard corpse.

item.name: Raccoon Meat
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used in Cooking.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Butchering a raccoon corpse.

- Usage: Steak, Meat Stew, Meat Pasta, etc.

item.name: Kuku Bird Meat
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used in Cooking.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Butchering a Kuku Bird corpse.

- Usage: Fried Bird, Steamed Bird, etc.

item.name: Flamingo Meat
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used in Cooking.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Butchering a flamingo corpse.

- Usage: Fried Bird, Steamed Bird, etc.
